! || are unnecessary for element hiding rule:
||digiato.com##.author-banner FIGCAPTION

||saveinter.net^$domaina=kamaihd.net

forum.p30world.com##yui-gen0,#yui-gen30,#yui-gen31,#yui-gen32,#yui-gen33,#yui-gen34,#yui-gen35,#yui-gen36gen37,#yui-gen38,##yui-gen39,#yui-gen40,#yui-gen41,#yui-gen42,#yui-gen43,#yui-gen44,#yui-gen45,#yui-gen46,#yui-gen47,#yui-gen48,#yui-gen49,#yui-gen50,#yui-gen51,#yui-gen52,#yui-gen53,#yui-gen54,#yui-gen55,#yui-gen56,#yui-gen57,#yui-gen58,#yui-gen59,#yui-gen60,#yui-gen61,#yui-gen62,#yui-gen63,#yui-gen64,#yui-gen65,#yui-gen66,#yui-gen67,#yui-gen68,#yui-gen69,#yui-gen70
